text:
Bhai already tumhara yearbook page appreciation se bhara h to pata nhi main extra kya hi likh paunga, fir bhi ek try de rha hu.

Ek saal hum roomie the to shayad kuch log se jyada jaanta hu tumhein main (hopefully), jitna relax karke tum padhte aur padhate the wo dekhkar abhi bhi yakeen nhi hota. PUBG master bhi nikale tum, ye bhi thoda weird tha xD. But itna chapu hone k baad bhi tum kaafi humble the, wo hamesha appreciate karta hu main. Exam mein cheating se lekar, exam se pehle k revision, aur dram practice par jaane se pehle kiye gye ESC201 k assignments k liye thanks. Mafia, scribble aur un intellectual discussions ko hamesha miss karunga!

And of course kabhi mauka mila to milenge zaroor.
Good luck!
author: Varun  Jain

text:
(Flow man) Shukla ji pranam ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™
Ek summer hum dono me poora ek saath bitaya h, reading room, Nipun ka whiteboard aur tera blue cover waala register, issue hi shuruaat ki thi aur bc kuch manning baad dono jagah nukkad jeet gya. Proud of youâ¤ï¸, kyunki mera to uss research mein thoda hi yogdaan tha, tu na hota to main akele to for sure kuch nhi kar paata.

Tum hamesha hi humlog k 5th coordi ho, chahe koi kuch bhi Kahe. Kitte hi bulle kaate hain tumhare saath, aur bc Abhi turant yaad aaya ki rafting k time tum Mali k saath nikal liye the, ğŸ˜ŒğŸ˜ŒğŸ˜Œ agli baar mauka mile to miss mat karna kaafi bakchod cheez h wo.

Baaki ab jyada puraani baatein yaad karne waalo mein se to main nhi hu isliye yahi khatam karte hain.

Best of luck, waise tum itne chapu ho ki tumhein zaroorat nhi h.
Aur haan Kidney ka Dhyan rakho bcğŸ˜‚

author: Varun  Jain

text:
â€œAre fazlu sunte ho, ye janab to bade rangeen mijaaz k lagte hainâ€¦.â€

Bro dramatics mein to hum ek doosre k supplement jaise hi the. Fazlu-Jamaal, Galaxy play 3rd year, galaxy nukkad 2nd year sab hum dono ne saath mein kiya, Dobara mat poochna mein kps k saamne har one liner k audition k liye bhi end mein bas hum dono hi last Bachte the, but a better actor as you are, you got most of those roles. I still remember orientation nukkad ki last night par tu Bol rha tha ki ab to role fix ho gye hain ab load nhi Lena chahiye, and in the next radio, tera Darbaari waala role Sakeri ko mil gya thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Joke maine actually poora likha tha bio mein, but some stupid piece of sh*t thought of putting a word limit in the bio section. ğŸ˜¤

Bro there is only one word that comes close in describing you - wholesome. You are the most eccentric and at the same time most talented person all the while being stoned or high on lsd afğŸ˜‚. 

Thanks for adding a rainbow of colours to my life.

Jamaal

P.S. Siddheshwar is out asking who took a pass at Maya and I told him it was you and now he is looking for you with a shotgun. Soâ€¦.umâ€¦..heads upğŸ˜›
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Agar koi mujhse kahe ki maine singlehandedly ek poore hall ko galaxy mein chaapne ka motivation diya h to I will wholeheartedly take that as a complimentğŸ˜œ

Choti ladki, jaisa ki hum tumko bulate hain, mere dominating nature ka tum shikaar bani is ka mujhse jyada dukh kisi aur ko nhi h. Isliye main sabke profile par maafiyaan maangta fir rha hu aur tum se bhi maang rha huğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™. Par Bas itna hi kahunga ki mera motive aisa kuch bhi nhi tha, hope you know that already. Hum to bithoor bhi Gaye the patch up karne k liye but tu hi nhi aayi thiğŸ˜›

Tera memoir padhke laga ki meri gaayki k kaafi saare fan ghoom rhe hain market mein. Zarranawaazi k liye shukriyaâ¤ï¸. Baaki miss to main bhi karunga hamari bhand-sober-musical nights. Hopefully kabhi mauka ho aur fir se waisi mehfil baneğŸ¤. 

Tera hum log ne kaafi mazaak Udaya h aur kuch nicknames bhi Rakhe hain but ab wo hi mazaak humein tujhe yaad rakhne mein madad karenge. 

Sab kuch hone k bawajood itna chill rehne k liye thanks.
Iss dominating bande ko jhelne k liye bhi thanksğŸ™

P.S. tere IAS banne k baad party lene aayenge
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Bhai apna to highlight Roorkee ki mess hi thi, ek dum laundo waale kaam kiye the tab Barwal k saathğŸ˜‚. Truth be told main aur kisi k saath kar bhi nhi pata wo sab harkatein, tumhare saath alag level ka comfort hota h, fir ya to doosre college mein jaakar lasna ho ya raat ko canteen mein BT bhari baatein ki future mein kya hoga sab mein tum hi hamare saathi theâ¤ï¸

As a dramatics coordi bolu to bhai tumne hamari zaroorat se jyada madad Kari h, wo tent mein se 8th slot ki parchi lekar bhagna aaj bhi yaad h. Bas bhai inter IIT nhi aaye tum uss baat ka thoda malaal aaj bhi h, but fir jo hua uske baad lagta h ki tu aata to ya to mere saath full gariyaane k mood mein aata ya fir ye sab bakchodi hone se bacha leta. 

Anyhoo hum dono ne hi club mein jamkar g*nd maarne ka mahaul shuru kiya tha fir uske baad dindor, Nipun, nana, Ostwal, koi nhi bacha. Bachne ko to upar aur neeche batch waale bhi nhi bache the waiseğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Baaki baat sexism ki rahi, ye sab chakkar likhit mein discuss na hi karein to achcha h, agar kahi logo ne proofread karliya to g*nd lag sakti h. Sexist hona ho ya dominating, apni 12+5 waali bonding alag hi level ki thi. 

Ab apn dono ki baat karein aur Prabhakar Pandey ko yaad na karein to aisa ho nhi sakta. But ab yaad karke jo gaaliyan nikal rhi h wo iss platform se jheli hi nhi jaayengi. Raat ko uski chamchagiri karna aur beech mein Dindor aur Nilay ko uske papas bhejkar hum dono aur Ostwal ek hi bed par so gye the - aaj bhi yaad hâ¤ï¸

Baaki jo tumne mere baare mein nss Nukaad k time socha tha to sahi hi socha tha - I have always been that kind of a guy. But ye tum log ne hi itna comfortable environment create Kardiya tha ki mere andar ka jaanwar bahar aa gyağŸ˜œ. 

Baaki bhai lockdown k baad baatein kam ho gyi h apni, but letâ€™s not keep it that way. Kabhi bhi call karlena to hum hamesha ready h BT lene k liye, ya kisi ka roast session karne k liye. 

Goodbye nhi kahenge, to isse achcha ek plan bana lete hain year end fir se Rishikesh jaakar rafting karne ka. Aa jaana bcğŸ™ƒ
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Kuch samajh nhi aa rha kya likhu bhai. Saara nostalgia to tumne hi Gina diya. To socha tere memoir ka reply sa hi de deta huğŸ˜‚. Nhi pasand aaye to bol dena bro kuch aur try karunga. 
First try mein likh rha hu, tabhi sabse sahi aur sachchi baatein bahar aayengi. Ho sakta h kuch content na ho aage bas aise hi bulla kaat k Khatam ho jayega ye. 
Shit, teri disclaimer dene waali aadat mujhe bhi lag gyiğŸ¤ª

Last k Dino mein hum log pehle se bhi jyada inseparable ho gye the. Achcha hua bhagwaan ne ye choti si window de di pandemic k beech mein nhi to bahut BT ho jaati. Nana ka cooler set kiya tha apan ne, Ostwal Rochak ko bahut saari gaali di, volleyball se handball bhi khel liya. Aur nana k saath Eklavya ki g*nd bhi maar liğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Wholesome tha sab. Bas yehi din sabse jyada yaad aayenge jab college time ki BT lunga kabhi main.

Haan yaar drameve 1 mein intro ki BT to h but mere liye to hamesha â€œye jo chanchal sa balak hâ€ waali BT top par rahegiğŸ˜”. Tu ghar chala gya tha to achcha nhi laga tha. But ab kar bhi kya sakte hainğŸ˜‡. Antaragni ka first gaana yaar main bhool gya. Bas kuch kuch lines hi yaad hainğŸ˜›. Although mera first gaana tha tere saath aur generally bhi but ab meri memory tumhari tarah sharp to nhi h. Inter IIT k time to humne hall 12 dominance ko shikhar pe chadha diya tha. Usmein bc tum aur Nipun bhi barbaar k hakdaar ho. Saalo mereko aage kar diya jaata h in sab case mein. 

Saath gaane ka to program banayenge hi kabhi to. Tu nhi aayega to tere ghar pahuch jayenge bc. Jab sur milte hain to alag hi feel aati h, aur ab to probably koi aur nhi milega sur milaane k liye tere alawağŸ˜­

Ye tujhe play k liye motivate karne waali baat to mujhe yaad nhi yaar. In fact kisi ko bhi motivate karna to yaad nhi h mujhe. Mostly demotivate hi kiya h Maine to. But agar meri kisi baat se tu motivate hua h chaapne k liye to iss baat se mujhse jyada Kush koi nhi hoga. Resume mein likhne waala point h ye toğŸ˜. Heavily motivated a team member to bla bla blaâ€¦â€¦ 

Baaki yaar ab Iâ€™m out of words. Kya likhein jise likhne se na mujhe BT ho na tujhe padhne mein ho. 

Jin baaton k liye tune thanks likha wo hi same baatein to meri taraf se bhi laagu hoti h.  But Abhi thanks likhenge to closure sa ho jayega, which I donâ€™t want. Kuch hona chahiye baad k liye. Isi bahane Milne ka aur baat karne ka bahana ho jayega. 

Kabhi BT ho ya kisi ki g*nd maarni ho ya fir kuch nhi ho karne ko to hum to hamesha haazir hain. Placement lagne tak to bc main hi ungli karta rahunga tum log ko. Apni Job mein to mera man waise bhi nhi lagne waalağŸ™ƒ. Milte h kisi video call mein jismein fir se most probably Nipun aur hum dono hi honge, aur offline bhi - jab tujhe ghar se nikalne ki permission mil jaayeğŸ˜‚. 

Uss din tu nhi aaya tha campus to achcha nhi laga tha, end mein ek dum se bye bolkar chala gya wo bhi achcha nhi laga (wo to achche se alvida hota to bhi achcha nhi lagta), jab main ghar par tha Bombay se aane k baad aur Tum logo ko mera raita sametna pada tha wo bhi achcha nhi laga, tu rafting k liye nhi aaya tha wo bhi miss kar diya tune, aur ab kaafi Dino baad milna hoga wo bhi achcha nhi lag rhaâ€¦

Until next timeâ€¦. Rafting karenge fir se bc. Yaad rakhna.

P.S. Teri ulti saaf karne mein mera koi haath nhi h, uska credit Rochak aur Aishwarya ko do. (Mujhe koi credit nhi chahiye.jpg)ğŸ˜œğŸ˜œ
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Ram ram bhaiğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™
Aisa koi aur nhi hoga campus mein jiske man mein juniors k liye mere jitni revolting feelings hogi ğŸ˜œğŸ˜œ. Anyways, tumhare to du waale dialogue k fan aaj hum bhi hain, aur confidence k bhi. Hopefully finally tumhara MOS paar ho gaya hogağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ bahut rr sune the uske.

Apan Sapna 4 dram trophy ka to 3rd year mein toot gya tha, but jitne maze in teen(ya probably 2, last waali to aisi-aisi hi thi) galaxies mein kiye wo tumhare bina to possible nhi hotaâ¤ï¸

Antaragni mein to yaad bhi nhi kitte scene banaye the tumhare saath aur summer play mein jo Gaddafi bane the tum wo chote  se role mein bhi(jo shayad end mein kat gya tha) bakchodi to poori daal di thiğŸ˜ Aur bc rendezvous mein mujhe aaj bhi yaad h jab play prelims mein meri aur Alan ki entry hui thi tab bc sabse jyada jor se tum hi hase theğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”

Hall 13 ki canteen mein pakadwane se lekar volleyball tak apne last 2 months bhi full bakchodi se guzre.â¤ï¸

Baaki asha karte hain tumhara IAS banne ka Sapna poora ho. Fir bc party lene aayenge.
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Dramatics club ki summer coordi ko pranaamğŸ™
Teri vocabulary ko dhyaan mein rakhkar likh rha hu so thank me later.

Hands down bina coordi hote hue jitna kaam tune kiya h utna to coordi hote hue kuch logon ne nhi kiya(not taking any names thoughğŸ˜›). Iss baat k liye to salute hona chahiye ek, shit koi emoji nhi h salute waala.

Anyhow, jitna tune improve Kara h both in Hindi and in acting wo to hum log ne last din drameve2 first year waala nukkad dekh kar hi samajh liya tha. Drameve2 ki dancing expert se lekar Galaxy ka â€œlo aa gye feminism ka nukkad lekarâ€ tak kaafi lambi journey rahi h aur wo bhi tune bina koi compulsion aur full enthu k saath Kari hâ¤ï¸

Baaki tune bahut saare assignments aur quizzes/exams mein madad Kari h uske liye thanks to Banta h. ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™

Waise to main offending aur dominating aur misogynistic(?) baatein karne k liye wrongly famous hu, to agar kabhi anjaane mein tujhe Maine aisa kuch bola ho to maar kar denağŸ˜…. Bombay waali bakchodi hone k baad tu hum log k team mein thi ye yaad karke Abhi bhi kaafi achcha lagta h, nhi to main aur Rochak to nikal hi lete campus se. But uss kaand k baad jis din tune mere room main mere aur Rochak k liye bhand ho kar BT lekar ro rhi thi to sach mein g*nd fat gyi thi. Hum dono k liye itna load lene ki zaroorat nhi h. Agar nikal bhi jaate to bas itna fark hota ki dindor k saath main bhi UPSC ki tayyaari kar rha hotağŸ˜…ğŸ˜…

Baaki nostalgia jyada yaad karne ki ichcha nhi h. 

Iss â€œsexist (nhi bc main sadist jyada hu)â€ bande k saath dosti rakhne k liye shukriya.

Your dominating branchmate.
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Bc bilkul bhool gya tha aaj deadline h to is jaldi jaldi likhe writeup ko memoir ki shakal shayad na de paaun. Sry ;)

Apna first year to kaafi sahi tha, wing ka sabse center waala room tha to sab hamare hi yahan aakar bakchodi karte the, kya kya karte the yaad bhi nhi h bc, poker, gpl, odyssey, ek wo khali bali waala dance  xD. But bahut maza aaya. Maana kaafi time drams mein busy that but baaki non-dram time to first year mein hi sabse bakchod tha, all thanks to you.

abhi jyada samay nhi h doosron ka memoir bhi likhna h to yahin khatam kar rha hu :(

author: Varun  Jain

text:
Ye memoir likhne ka space hamari memories sambhal nhi payega. Aur apni jaisi personality h to uske hisaab se jyada rr karna bhi sahi nhi lag rha. Jitna kam maza mujhe room par baithke aata h aur jitne jyada easily tere ghar waale tujhe bahar nikalne dete hain apan Milne to waale hain hiğŸ˜. To ab memories likhne se achcha kuch plans likh rha hu jo hum already kar chuke hain but mere fir se karne ki ichcha h.

Pehle to wo December 2019 k pehle 10 din recreate to karne hi hain. As usual main to sober hi rahunga kyunki kisi ko to 3 kutton ko sambhalna hi padega.

Rishikesh waali rafting fir se karte hain. Aur bc iss baar lamba plan banayenge aur unlike last time ek legit jagah party karne jayengeğŸ˜›.

Apna sizzle dazzle brownie bhi rhe gya. Wo to ab shayad campus mein hi afford kar payenge apan log, unless tune placement mein 30lpa score kar liya(best of luckğŸ¤)

Lucknow jaisi trip fir se honi chahiye. Kisi jagah pahunch pe fir chal chal k jo achchi jagah h wahan khane jao, fir bc in 3 din mein 4k Kharcha kar do to bhi chill h. Lekin iss baar KT nhi aaya to pakka uske ghar pahunch jayengeğŸ˜‚

Z-square k pass ki lassi peete hain. Uska raasta mujhe thoda thoda hi yaad h but wo first year ki tatti skit k liye samaan laane k depression k baad alag hi chaap diya tha uss lassi ne. 

Fir se waisa ad banate hain(new shop c waala), matlab ad nhi banayenge, kuch banate time waisi (sacred games k Nawaz waala bencho) waali bakchodiyan fir se karenge. Bothra ki to g*nd maarli thi humne tab. But iss baar bc thoda comfortable ho jaana camera k saamne.

Library k baad doaa chalenge. Ya waisa hi similar experience kisi aur setting mein. Jitna padhte nhi the utna to doaa mein time barbaad kar dete the. Kabhi main tu kt aur Dindor, kabhi Aishwarya k saath, to kabhi bas hum teen hi. Isliye bc latter semesters mein Maine room par hi padhna shuru kar diya tha.

Standup karna bsdk tu. Saath mein script likhenge. Teri wajah se mujhe karna pad gya tha Roorkee mein, although I enjoyed it anyway but still, tujhe karne ki zaroorat h. Kuch nhi to bas 2 min k open mic mein apna best joke hi suna dena but shuru karo bc. Kab tak g*nd fategi tumhariğŸ˜¤

Aage k plans thode chote scale par hain aur kuch to impossible se hain but bear with me. 

Uss din ki tarah skywalk par baarish mein fir se bulla kaatenge. But iss baar apne Baaki laundo ko bhi saath mein le lenge. Alag hi experience tha wo bhi.

Fir se first year ki tarah soc ki (literally)surprise quiz dekar aate hain. Chutiyon ki tarah time pass karenge fir 10 min baad hall mein ghuske gaand fadwayenge.

Fir se waise canteen mein baithke 2 scenes likhte hain. Isi bahane kuch sketch to bana hi lenge. Fir bas 2 actors ki zaroorat hogi shoot karne k liye.

2.2 k 2-4 draft aur bana lete hain. Last mein Raja waala to anshumali ne copied bolkar kata diya tha. But aaj tak samajh nhi aaya wo kahan se copied h.

Flow ki maa ki ch*t Karke ek aur kalua inspired bas bakch*di waala scene bana lete hain. But iss baar kaali pahadi k peeche hi milenge. Construction ka kaam khatam ho gya hoga ab tak to.

Volleyball khelte hain. Jaise hi thoda khelna seekha bc campus hi band ho gya. Smash maarna to seekh hi nhi paaya main.

Squad2.0 banate hain, iss baar Bothra ko nhi lenge. KT k taane nhi sunne fir se. 

Fir se sabke saath poker/mafia/pictionary/csgo/red King/bluff/almost any other game khelte hain.

Fir se canteen chai peene chalte hain. Lalaji ki cheese ball khayenge aur sting bhi le lenge.

Fir se kisi joke ko tab tak extend karte hain jab tak wo funny se bahut jyada door chala jaaye.

Fir se sabke saath ek mjo ka episode ya meri suggest ki hui movie dekhte hain(iss baar pakka mast movie suggest karunga)

Fir se ek bhand night karte hain. Main to obviously sober rahunga tab bhi.

Fir se ek room mein baithkar Apna apna dabba lekar ghanto tak kuch bhi nhi karte hain.

Until next time. Bc BT kam lo aur Bhagwan Kare tumhari body ban jaaye.

CiaoğŸ˜›
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Jai jinendra dostğŸ™ğŸ™
Bhai jaisa nostalgia tune yaad dila diya maza hi aagya. But ab samajh nhi aa rha ki main kya likhunga.
Apne chaaro coordinators k 4C2 combinations mein apni hi sabse kam Banti thi but still apan log ne kaafi kuch saath mein kar liya. Jaise log kehte hain â€œlike repelâ€ isliye mujhe hamesha se lagta h ki hum dono kaafi similar hain in many respects (ab ye tareef h ya bezzati ye tujhe hi decide karna padegağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜). 
Anyway, apna to mujhe dram treat aur Diwali treat k liye sabke room par saath mein bheekh maangna hi sabse jyada yaad aata h. Anshumali k saath almost jugnu ho jaata merağŸ˜°. Bc tere jaate hue maine anshumali k room se awaaz lagayi thi tujhe aur mujhe aaj bhi 95% surety h ki tune suna aur respond nhi kiya thağŸ˜¤. Bansal k 500 teen hazaar mein convert karaye the. Aur finally bc Anaichas waale ko choona lagaya thağŸ¤ªğŸ¤ª

Antaragni k result announce hone k baad sirf hum dono hi fate the, pata nhi ye kyun yaad aa rha h but â€œI feel you broâ€ bolne ki ichcha hi rhi h uss time k liyeğŸ˜‡ Apna interIIT ka second scene shayad iklauta tha jo humne saath mein kiya tha. Sahi tha yaar wo. Usse pehle December mein bitaye 10 din to hamesha hi yaad rahenge. Fir se karenge yaar wo. Rochak Nipun ko bhi bola h Maine to bhai aa jaana kabhi to. Maza aayega.

Bas bhai humko bhool mat jaana (waise lakshan to tumhare waise hi hain bc). Tum log agar bhand nhi hoge to hamara kaarobaar bhi nhi chalegağŸ˜. Baaki I am always available agar Teri kabhi ichcha ho baat karne ki, but you know that anyways. 

Letâ€™s not call this a goodbye. Abhi hum zinda h aur Abhi to kaafi baar tujhe tokenge hamesha ki tarah firse koi bakchodi karne k liye. But hamesha ki tarah kaat mat dena bhai hamarağŸ˜”.

Aasha karte hain tumhara pet tumhari ichcha anusaar badh jaaye.

Aapka fellow coordinator aur jainbandhu.
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Nana bhai tumhara memoir dekh kar laga ki maine shayad jyada hi pratadit kar diya tujheğŸ˜‚. Sorry bhaisahabğŸ‘‹

Har kisi ko uski zindagi mein ek nana ki zaroorat Padti hi h. Wo Nana kisi bhi time kaise bhi mahual ko kab bakchodi waala karde pata nhi lagta (haan bc shooooeeess.. waale incident ki hi baat kar rha hu). Par agar uss nana ko bhand thoda dhyaan se karna chahiye nhi to DJ khalid bankar g*nd bhi faad sakta h wo. 

Bas bhai ek hi baat bolna chahta hu main- kabhi badalna mat nana bhai. Ye duniya jismein Varun jaise mc log bhare pade hain, wahan nana jaise log hi balance laa sakte hainğŸ˜œ. Sach keh rha hu apne coordi tenure ka antaragni phase mein agar main kisi tarah survive Kara hu to wo Teri wajah se. Jab junior aur seniors ko sambhalne mein g*nd fat jaati tab tere saath do char joke maarne aur Teri bakchodiyan sambhalne se hi thoda sukoon milia tha apne ko. Agar iss beech Teri jyada g*nd maarli to bc bakchodi kam karni chahiye na mujhe mauka hi mat do bsdk g*nd maarne ka. 

Tumhari chaapne k kisse ginane lagenge to kisi aur k memoir likhne ki jagah nhi bachegiğŸ˜…. Aside from every other chapuness, Main to Teri whistling ka alag fan tha. Mujhe generally sur mein whistling karne waale logon se alag nafrat h but Teri whistling to sun k maza aa jaata hâ¤ï¸

Apan ne jo 2nd year drameve1 mein scenes improvise Kare the wo bhai hamesha yaad rahenge. Uske alawa to jo apni antaragni mein anginat scenes banaye wo yaad rakhna to thoda mushkil h. Teri ccd waali bakchodi ko to bhool nhi sakta, na main aur na hi ktğŸ˜¤. 

Baaki kabhi C 408 aane ka man Kare to mere darwaaze to hamesha khule hain. Tumko aane ki mehnat karni padegi. Bc har baar ki tarah 10 phone mat karana aur aa rha hu bolkar ek ghante baad mat aana.

Tumhara proactive friend.
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Bahut sochne aur procrastination k baad mujhe kya likhna h samajh nhi aaya so I am going to write as I think, to ho sakta h ki jo banda hamesha tumhari g*nd maarta tha aaj flow flow mein Teri tareef hi kardeğŸ˜‰

Apni bakchodiyon ko shabdo mein likhna possible nhi h Kitni aur kaisi kaisi Kari hain ye to sabko pata hi h. Bas wo rendezvous waala ganjedi yaad aa jaaata h baar baar. Bc sadak se uthakar dealer bana diya tha humne ğŸ˜‚. Utna bakchod Aadmi dekha nhi aaj tak. Usne bc Sachan aur Sakeri ki g*nd faaad di thi unki coffee fek karğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Tera â€œhag diya bcâ€ aur â€œbamboo ki disha mudti huiâ€ hamesha yaad rahegaâ¤ï¸. B115 mein Kari hui saari bakchodiyan yaad rahegi. January mein mere room par jab sab hamare liye ro rhe the us time kisi ko fuck na dekar hasna bhi yaad rahega, although mujhe yaad nhi ki uss kaand mein tu kaise fas Gaya thağŸ˜… Ab ye thoda poetic ho rha h shayad to kuch aur soch rha hu(Maine pehle hi bola tha jaise dimaag mein aa rha h likh rha hu to bahut saari gibberish expect karoğŸ˜Œ)

Oh bc December to bhool hi gya tha. Yaar waise 10 din waali bakchodi fir se karni h kabhi to. Maza hi aa gya tha. Nipun ko main le aaunga(probably) tu Ostwal ko le aanağŸ™ğŸ™. 

Thanks likhunga abhi to kahin tujhe closure na mil jaaye isliye nhi likhunga. Is bahane apna contact to bana rahega ki kabhi to aisa din aayega jab main hag diya bc bolunga aur tu hoga wo sunne k liyeğŸ˜† Baaki bhai hamare saath bhand hone k liye (matlab main sober aur tum bhand) aur bina bhand hue bhi waise waali harkate karne k liye dhanyawaad. Shit end mein Maine Bol hi diyağŸ˜…. Chal neutralize karne k liye last line padh lena.

Bc ye goodbye nhi h. Jab tum IAS ban jaoge tab party Lene ayenge. Good luck ğŸ¤. 

P.S.  Bhai tere bio mein likhi angrezi suit nhi kar rhiğŸ˜œğŸ˜œ kuch rekhta se hi chaap leta to sahi rehta ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”
author: Varun  Jain

text:
Bhaiâ€¦..â¤ï¸
Sunne mein aaya h ki bahut pratadit kiya h Maine tumko Antaragni mein(aisi complain tumhari akele ki nhi h waise toğŸ˜œ) to bhai maafi maant rha hu, kyunki yaseen k gusse ko main to nhi knel paunga ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Galaxy, antaragni aur drameve1 second year waali mein itni bakchodi Kari h ki pinpoint hi nhi kar pata rha hu. But sabse jyada maza to probably IIT Roorkee ki mess mein aaya tha, tu main aur AishwaryağŸ˜œ. Wo trip bhi awesome thi, aur itne  moments bane h jo hamesha yaad rahenge.

Tum bc gensec ban jaate but tumne IAS ko chuna, and seriously itna devoted Banda maine to AajTak nhi dekha tha jitna tune apne aap ko kar liya tha. 

God bless Tera selection ho jaaye , fir bc 
Party dena mat bhoolnağŸ˜›
